choiceresponse.p: In Trainingland, navigate to the “Immunisation maps” dashboard. Find the map “EPI - DPT 1-3 dropout rate by district” and use the context menu to open it in the Maps app. Select the option needed to show the data table for the thematic layer.

label.h3: Which of the following are column headers in the data table?

div.p: To show a data table, you need to select the more actions menu in the layer card then ‘Show data table’. Column headers for this data table include: Color, parent, value and range. Data entry date is not a column header available in the data table.
